00001 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00002 | File name: gl_shapes.h                                                                                                       |
00003 | Date:          21st February 2006                                                                                            |

00006 | Some basic shapes - box, sphere, cylinder...                                 |
00007 | all of those shapes are drawn in the center of the coordinate system         |

00012 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00013 |                                  DrawCube                                    |
00014 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00015 void DrawCube(float size)
00016 {
00017         size*=0.5f;
00018 
00019         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00020 
00021                 // front wall:
00022                 glNormal3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00023                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, size, size);
00024                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-size, -size, size);
00025                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, -size, size);
00026                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(size, size, size);
00027 
00028                 // right wall:
00029                 glNormal3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00030                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(size, size, size);
00031                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, -size, size);
00032                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, -size, -size);
00033                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(size, size, -size);
00034 
00035                 // back wall:
00036                 glNormal3f(0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f);
00037                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(size, size, -size);
00038                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, -size, -size);
00039                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-size, -size, -size);
00040                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, size, -size);
00041 
00042                 // left wall:
00043                 glNormal3f(-1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00044                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, size, -size);
00045                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-size, -size, -size);
00046                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-size, -size, size);
00047                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, size, size);
00048 
00049                 // top wall:
00050                 glNormal3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00051                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, size, -size);
00052                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-size, size, size);
00053                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, size, size);
00054                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(size, size, -size);
00055 
00056                 // bottom wall:
00057                 glNormal3f(0.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f);
00058                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, -size, -size);
00059                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, -size, -size);
00060                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(size, -size, size);
00061                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-size, -size, size);
00062         glEnd();
00063 }

00065 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00066 |                                  DrawCube                                    |
00067 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 void DrawBox(float sizex, float sizey, float sizez) {
00069         // the code is almost the same as in the DrawCube function...
00070         sizex*=0.5f;
00071         sizey*=0.5f;
00072         sizez*=0.5;
00073 
00074         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00075 
00076                 // front wall:
00077         glNormal3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00078                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, sizey, sizez);
00079                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, -sizey, sizez);
00080                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, -sizey, sizez);
00081                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, sizey, sizez);
00082 
00083                 // right wall:
00084                 glNormal3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00085                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, sizey, sizez);
00086                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, -sizey, sizez);
00087                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, -sizey, -sizez);
00088                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, sizey, -sizez);
00089 
00090                 // back wall:
00091                 glNormal3f(0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f);
00092                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, sizey, -sizez);
00093                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, -sizey, -sizez);
00094                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, -sizey, -sizez);
00095                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, sizey, -sizez);
00096 
00097                 // left wall:
00098                 glNormal3f(-1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00099                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, sizey, -sizez);
00100                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, -sizey, -sizez);
00101                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, -sizey, sizez);
00102                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, sizey, sizez);
00103 
00104                 // top wall:
00105                 glNormal3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00106                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, sizey, -sizez);
00107                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, sizey, sizez);
00108                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, sizey, sizez);
00109                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, sizey, -sizez);
00110 
00111                 // bottom wall:
00112                 glNormal3f(0.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f);
00113                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, -sizey, -sizez);
00114                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, -sizey, -sizez);
00115                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex3f(sizex, -sizey, sizez);
00116                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-sizex, -sizey, sizez);
00117         glEnd();
00118 }

00120 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00121 |                                  DrawPyramid                                 |
00122 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00123 void DrawPyramid(float width, float height) {
00124         width*=0.5f;
00125 
00126         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_FAN);
00127             // top
00128             glNormal3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00129                 glTexCoord2f(0.5f, 0.0f);
00130                 glVertex3f(0.0f, height, 0.0f);
00131 
00132                 glNormal3f(-0.7071f, 0.0f, 0.7071f);
00133                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f);
00134                 glVertex3f(-width, 0.0f, width);
00135 
00136                 glNormal3f(0.7071f, 0.0f, 0.7071f);
00137                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f);
00138                 glVertex3f(width, 0.0f, width);
00139 
00140                 glNormal3f(0.7071f, 0.0f, -0.7071f);
00141                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f);
00142                 glVertex3f(width, 0.0f, -width);
00143 
00144                 glNormal3f(-0.7071f, 0.0f, -0.7071f);
00145                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f);
00146                 glVertex3f(-width, 0.0f, -width);
00147 
00148                 glNormal3f(-0.7071f, 0.0f, 0.7071f);
00149                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f);
00150                 glVertex3f(-width, 0.0f, width);
00151         glEnd();
00152 
00153         // floor:
00154         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00155             glNormal3f(0.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f);
00156                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f);
00157                 glVertex3f(width, 0.0f, -width);
00158 
00159                 glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f);
00160                 glVertex3f(width, 0.0f, width);
00161 
00162                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f);
00163                 glVertex3f(-width, 0.0f, width);
00164 
00165                 glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f);
00166                 glVertex3f(-width, 0.0f, -width);
00167         glEnd();
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00171 |                                DrawSphere                                    |
00172 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00173 | Creates sphere n point (0, 0, 0) withh radius: rx on X axis, ry on y axis        |
00174 | and rz on Z axis, nx and ny are numbers of walls...                          |
00175 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00176 | Obtained form: "OpenGL sphere with texture coordinates" by Paul Bourke       |
00177 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00178 void DrawSphere(float rx, float ry, float rz, int nx, int ny, bool spread, bool inverse)
00179 {
00180    int i,j;
00181    double theta1,theta2,theta3;
00182    float ex, ey, ez, px, py, pz;
00183    float s[4] = { 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f };
00184    float t[4] = { 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f };
00185    int tid;
00186 
00187    if (inverse == true) glFrontFace(GL_CW);
00188 
00189    ny<<=1;
00190 
00191    for (j=0;j<ny>>1;j++)
00192    {
00193           theta1 = (double)j * M_2_PI/(double)ny - M_PI*0.5f;
00194       theta2 = (double)(j + 1) * M_2_PI /(double)ny - M_PI*0.5f;
00195 
00196           tid = 0;
00197 
00198       glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP);
00199       for (i=0;i<=nx;i++) {
00200          theta3 = (double)i * M_2_PI/ (double)nx;
00201 
00202          ex = (float)(cos(theta2) * cos(-theta3));
00203          ey = (float)sin(theta2);
00204          ez = (float)(cos(theta2) * sin(-theta3));
00205          px = rx * ex;
00206          py = ry * ey;
00207          pz = rz * ez;
00208 
00209          if (inverse == false) glNormal3f(ex, ey, ez);
00210                  else glNormal3f(-ex, -ey, -ez);
00211          
00212                  if (spread == true) glTexCoord2f((float)i/(float)nx,2*(float)(j+1)/(float)ny);
00213                  else glTexCoord2f(s[tid], t[tid]);
00214 
00215          glVertex3f(px,py,pz);
00216 
00217                  tid++;
00218 
00219          ex = (float)(cos(theta1) * cos(-theta3));
00220          ey = (float)sin(theta1);
00221          ez = (float)(cos(theta1) * sin(-theta3));
00222          px = rx * ex;
00223          py = ry * ey;
00224          pz = rz * ez;
00225 
00226          if (inverse == false) glNormal3f(ex,ey,ez);
00227                  else glNormal3f(-ex, -ey, -ez);
00228          
00229                  if (spread == true) glTexCoord2f((float)i/(float)nx,2*(float)j/(float)ny);
00230                  else glTexCoord2f(s[tid], t[tid]);
00231          
00232                  glVertex3f(px,py,pz);
00233 
00234                  tid++;
00235                  if (tid == 4) tid = 0;
00236       }
00237       glEnd();
00238    }
00239 
00240    if (inverse == true) glFrontFace(GL_CCW);
00241 }
00242 
00243 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00244 |                                DrawCylinder                                  |
00245 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00246 void DrawCylinder(float r, float h, int nx, int ny, bool spread, bool top, bool bottom)
00247 {
00248         double ang, sa;
00249         float sy;
00250         float px, py, pz;
00251         float hbuf = h*0.5f;
00252         int i, j;
00253 
00254         sa = M_2_PI/(double)nx;
00255         sy = h/(float)ny;
00256         h*=0.5f;
00257 
00258         for (i = 0; i < ny; i++)
00259         {
00260                 ang = 0.0f;
00261 
00262                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP);
00263                 for (j = 0; j <= nx; j++)
00264                 {
00265                         px = (float)cos(ang);
00266                         py = h;
00267                         pz = (float)sin(-ang);
00268 
00269                         glNormal3f(px, 0.0f, pz);
00270                         if (spread == true) glTexCoord2f((float)(ang/M_2_PI), sy*(float)i);
00271                         else glTexCoord2f((j % 2 == 1 ? 1.0f : 0.0f), sy*(float)i);
00272                         glVertex3f(px*r, py, pz*r);
00273 
00274                         glNormal3f(px, 0.0f, pz);
00275                         if (spread == true) glTexCoord2f((float)(ang/M_2_PI), sy*(float)(i+1));
00276                         else glTexCoord2f((j % 2 == 1 ? 1.0f : 0.0f), sy*(float)(i+1)); 
00277                         glVertex3f(px*r, h-sy, pz*r);
00278 
00279                         ang += sa;
00280                 }
00281                 glEnd();
00282 
00283                 h-=sy;
00284         }
00285 
00286         if (top == true) {
00287         ang = 0.0;
00288                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_FAN);
00289                         glNormal3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00290                         glTexCoord2f(0.5f, 0.0f);
00291                     glVertex3f(0.0f, hbuf, 0.0f);
00292                     for (i = 0; i <= nx; ++i) {
00293                             px = (float)cos(ang);
00294                             py = h;
00295                             pz = (float)sin(-ang);
00296                                 glNormal3f(px, 0.0f, pz);
00297                                 if (spread == true) glTexCoord2f((float)ang/M_2_PI, 1);
00298                             else glTexCoord2f((i % 2 == 0 ? 1.0f : 0.0f), 1);
00299                                 glVertex3f(px*r, hbuf, pz*r);
00300                                 ang+=sa;
00301                         }
00302                 glEnd();
00303         }
00304 
00305         if (top == true) {
00306         ang = M_2_PI;
00307                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_FAN);
00308                         glNormal3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00309                         glTexCoord2f(0.5f, 0.0f);
00310                     glVertex3f(0.0f, -hbuf, 0.0f);
00311                     for (i = 0; i <= nx; ++i) {
00312                             px = (float)cos(ang);
00313                             py = h;
00314                             pz = (float)sin(-ang);
00315                                 glNormal3f(px, 0.0f, pz);
00316                                 if (spread == true) glTexCoord2f((float)(ang/M_2_PI), 1);
00317                             else glTexCoord2f((i % 2 == 0 ? 1.0f : 0.0f), 1);
00318                                 glVertex3f(px*r, -hbuf, pz*r);
00319                                 ang-=sa;
00320                         }
00321                 glEnd();
00322         }
00323 }
